name: Shorty's Place
description: Classic Texas dive bar with cheap drinks, pool tables, and authentic local character.
longDescription: Shorty's Place is the real deal—a genuine dive bar where cold beer is cheap, the jukebox plays country, and the locals are friendly. This is where fishermen unwind after a day on the water and newcomers become regulars. The worn wooden bar, neon signs, and pool tables create an atmosphere you can't fake.
address: 322 E Avenue G, Port Aransas, TX 78373

name: Port A Beach Bar
description: Beachside watering hole with frozen drinks, live music, and sand between your toes.
longDescription: Port A Beach Bar delivers the quintessential beach bar experience. Located right on the sand, this open-air bar serves frozen drinks, cold beer, and simple beach fare while you wiggle your toes in the sand. Live music on weekends adds to the party atmosphere, and the sunset views are free.
address: Beach Access Road 1A, Port Aransas, TX 78373

name: Barnacle Bill's
description: Tropical tiki bar with rum cocktails, island vibes, and quirky nautical decor.
longDescription: Barnacle Bill's transports you to the tropics with its tiki torches, rum-heavy drink menu, and wall-to-wall nautical decor. The cocktails are strong, the bartenders are characters, and the laid-back island vibe permeates everything. It's tacky in the best possible way—flamingos, fishing nets, and all.

name: The Surf Club
description: Port Aransas's go-to spot for dancing, DJs, and late-night entertainment.
longDescription: When Port Aransas wants to dance, it heads to The Surf Club. This energetic nightclub features DJs, a dance floor, and the kind of late-night energy you'd expect from a beach town bar. It's the place to be after the sun goes down, especially on weekends when the crowds get rowdy in the best way.
address: 216 E Cotter Ave, Port Aransas, TX 78373

name: The Pirate Bar
description: Pirate-themed waterfront bar with rum drinks, themed decor, and harbor views.
longDescription: Ahoy matey! The Pirate Bar embraces Port Aransas's pirate history with themed decor, rum-heavy drinks, and enough pirate puns to make you groan. But beyond the gimmick, it's a genuinely fun waterfront bar with great views of the harbor. The staff plays along with the theme, and the drinks are surprisingly good.
address: 227 N Station St, Port Aransas, TX 78373

name: Coconuts Beach Bar & Grill
description: Beachfront bar and grill with tropical drinks, casual food, and Gulf views.
longDescription: Coconuts Beach Bar & Grill offers everything you want from a beach bar—tropical drinks, casual food, and endless Gulf views. The open-air setting catches the sea breeze, and the laid-back atmosphere encourages lingering. It's perfect for transitioning from beach day to beach night.

name: McKenney's Irish Pub
description: Traditional Irish pub with Guinness on tap, pub fare, and live Celtic music nights.
longDescription: McKenney's brings a taste of Ireland to the Texas coast. This authentic Irish pub pours a proper Guinness, serves hearty pub fare, and hosts live Celtic music nights. It's a cozy refuge from the beach bars, with dark wood, proper pints, and the kind of atmosphere that encourages long conversations.
address: 112 E Avenue G, Port Aransas, TX 78373

name: Pelican Landing Bar
description: Casual marina bar with cold beer, fishing stories, and boat-watching.
longDescription: Pelican Landing Bar is where boat people gather. Located at the marina, this casual bar is all about cold beer, fishing stories, and watching boats come and go. The clientele is an authentic mix of charter captains, recreational fishermen, and curious visitors. No pretense here—just good drinks and better tales.
address: 440 W Cotter Ave, Port Aransas, TX 78373

name: The Sandbar Grill & Bar
description: Sports bar with big screens, cold beer, and game-day energy.
longDescription: The Sandbar is Port Aransas's go-to spot for watching the game. Multiple big screens, cold beer on tap, and a menu of bar favorites make it perfect for Cowboys games, March Madness, or any sporting event. The crowd gets into it, creating a fun game-day atmosphere.
address: 501 E Avenue G, Port Aransas, TX 78373
tips: Get there early for big games

name: Wanna Wanna Beach Bar & Grill
description: Iconic Port Aransas beach bar with famous frozen drinks and party atmosphere.
longDescription: Wanna Wanna is legendary in Port Aransas. This beachside institution is known for its famous frozen drinks (ask for the Wanna Wanna), live music, and party atmosphere that can start surprisingly early in the day. The outdoor seating, beach views, and anything-goes vibe make it a must-visit.

name: The Hideaway Lounge
description: Low-key dive with cheap drinks, pool, and a local crowd seeking refuge from tourists.
longDescription: The Hideaway Lounge lives up to its name—it's where locals go to escape the tourist crowd. This unpretentious dive bar offers cheap drinks, a pool table, and the kind of worn-in comfort that can't be manufactured. If you want to meet actual Port Aransas residents, this is the place.
address: 215 S Alister St, Port Aransas, TX 78373

name: Island Time Brewing
description: Craft brewery taproom with house-made beers, outdoor seating, and chill vibes.
longDescription: Island Time Brewing brings craft beer culture to Port Aransas with a rotating selection of house-made brews. The taproom is relaxed and welcoming, with outdoor seating perfect for lazy afternoons. Their beers range from light beach-friendly lagers to more adventurous seasonal offerings. Food trucks often park outside.

name: Quarter Moon Bar
description: Upscale cocktail bar with craft cocktails, intimate atmosphere, and refined drinks.
longDescription: Quarter Moon Bar offers a more sophisticated drinking experience in Port Aransas. The craft cocktails are made with care using quality spirits, and the intimate atmosphere provides a refreshing alternative to the beach bar scene. It's perfect for date night or when you want something beyond a frozen drink.
address: 311 S Station St, Port Aransas, TX 78373

name: Captain Ron's
description: Old-school fishing bar with cold beer, fish stories, and walls covered in photos.
longDescription: Captain Ron's is a Port Aransas institution—an old-school fishing bar where the walls are covered with photos of legendary catches and the regulars have stories for days. The beer is cold, the atmosphere is authentic, and the fishing talk is constant. It's the kind of place that can't be replicated.
address: 235 W Cotter Ave, Port Aransas, TX 78373

name: Sunset Lounge
description: Rooftop bar with panoramic sunset views, cocktails, and elevated atmosphere.
longDescription: Sunset Lounge offers the best sunset views in Port Aransas from its rooftop perch. The panoramic vistas stretch from the Gulf to the bay, making it the perfect spot for golden hour. The cocktails are well-crafted, the atmosphere is more refined than typical beach bars, and the views are absolutely worth the slightly higher prices.
address: 400 W Cotter Ave, Port Aransas, TX 78373

name: The Island Pub
description: Neighborhood pub with friendly bartenders, trivia nights, and a welcoming atmosphere.
longDescription: The Island Pub is the neighborhood gathering spot—a friendly pub where everyone knows your name (eventually). Weekly trivia nights draw regulars, the bartenders remember what you drink, and the atmosphere is warmly welcoming. It's the perfect antidote to the party-heavy beach bar scene.
address: 524 E Avenue G, Port Aransas, TX 78373

name: Fisherman's Wharf Bar
description: Working waterfront bar where charter captains and anglers gather after trips.
longDescription: Fisherman's Wharf Bar sits right on the working waterfront where charter boats dock. This is where captains unwind after long days on the water and successful anglers celebrate their catches. The drinks are strong, the atmosphere is salty and authentic, and the fishing stories are as fresh as the day's catch.
address: 318 W Cotter Ave, Port Aransas, TX 78373

name: Latitude 27.8 Bar & Grill
description: Beach bar named for Port Aransas's latitude, with tropical drinks and good vibes.
longDescription: Latitude 27.8 (Port Aransas's actual latitude) is a beach bar that celebrates its coastal location with tropical drinks, seafood, and beach vibes. The outdoor seating, palm trees, and tiki torches create a perfect tropical atmosphere. It's the kind of place where you lose track of time—and that's exactly the point.
